Question.Subject: LOCKERZ - Getting alot of PTZ by making alot of email accounts - can u get banned for it?
Question.Content:
If i kept makign msn email addresses, then using my lockerz account to invite them and then sign the addresses up to lockerz, i could get 120PTZ a hour.
is it ok to do this? could i get banned? or totally safe?
Question.ChosenAnswer: its not ok but i did it i made 15 yahoo accounts 2 gmail and 3 msn still not banned dont use those 10 minute emails that last for 10minutes

Answer.Content: You'll get banned, there is no question about it. Lockerz invests a lot of money into catching cheaters

You can only have one, they ban people with more than one.
9.How many accounts can I have? Members are entitled to one account per person. Each eligible person within a household can have their own account.
its not ok but i did it i made 15 yahoo accounts 2 gmail and 3 msn still not banned dont use those 10 minute emails that last for 10minutes
